message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a bit high for me. Would you consider $65?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and sell the product to you for $75.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit, but I'm trying to keep my spending under $70.  Would you do $68?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to keep your spending under $70, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make another compromise and sell the product to you for $72.
